question: some people say that teenagers should work part-time and earn money. This way they will learn basic lesson about work abs become more disciplined other argue that teenagers shouldn't sacrifice their rest and after school activities to work. Discuss both views and give your opinion?
text: Few individuals think that getting fundamental lessons about working place and having a more conscious mindset about life and schedule through part-time job is a prime obligation for teenagers but other assume that this would impact on their health and mind. However, growth in life is necessary and i do agree with this given statement because part time working zone trained their mind about financial goal, knowing or unknowingly and it also gives wider perspective and imagination to them.

To begin with, knowing about financial transactions and having deep knowledge about monetary process of expenditure is the need of an hour because nobody wants financial crisis in the life but part-time job teaches this automatically. To exemplify, one candidate from school who is working as a half day employee have more accurate information and wisdom about where he spent the bucks and why he spend it as compared to the other boy who is belong to same batch but not working as a half day employee. This research demonstrates the clear perspective and norms about financial goals of teenagers.

In addition, nowadays youngsters are more intelligent and they are always looking for more theories about their field. Part-time job giving this opportunity to them by introducing new skills and method while working as an employee in any organization which further gives overwhelming repercussions to them by psychologically and professionally. For instance, part time working teenagers has wide horizon and range of business, technique and growth planning and they also have strategies about how to grow a business through experience so that they can able to see satisfactory graphs and reports about organization and success.
To reiterate this working part time should mandatory for teenagers and I think it would beneficial for government and the country's economy.

error_list.error: refers to the speaker or writer
